message.content:
First, I need to identify the line item that pertains to the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life. This line item is typically labeled as "Depreciation" in the cash flow statement.

Looking at the provided cash flow statement data:

- I see a line labeled "Depreciation" with an amount of 45757.71 on 2024-01-29.

Therefore, the value of depreciation (the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount) is 45757.71.

Now, I will format my answer as required.

```json
{"solution": {"value": "45757.71"}}
```
